mapper.select: SELECT b.*, DATE_FORMAT(begintime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS begintime2, DATE_FORMAT(endtime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS endtime2, f.* FROM FOOD114_BOARD b LEFT JOIN FOOD114_BOARD_FILE f ON b.boardno = f.boardno WHERE CODE = 3 AND f.USAGE = 'TITLE' AND b.ENDYN = #{endYn}
mapper.update: UPDATE FOOD114_BOARD SET endyn='Y' WHERE NOW()>endtime AND endyn='N'
mapper.select: SELECT *, DATE_FORMAT(begintime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS begintime2, DATE_FORMAT(endtime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS endtime2 FROM FOOD114_BOARD b INNER JOIN FOOD114_BIZ_INFO i ON b.USERID=i.bizid WHERE CODE = 4 AND endyn = 'N' AND oldaddr LIKE (concat('%',#{selectSi},'%')) AND OLDaddr LIKE (concat('%',#{selectGu},'%')) AND OLDaddr LIKE (concat('%',#{selectDong},'%'));
SELECT * FROM FOOD114_BOARD WHERE CODE = 1 ORDER BY BOARDNO LIMIT 1 OFFSET 10
SELECT * FROM FOOD114_BOARD WHERE BOARDNO = #{boardNo} AND CODE = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FOOD114_BOARD VALUES(, #{title}, #{contents}, 1, #{userId}, 1, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, null, null, null)
mapper.select: SELECT fb.BOARDNO, fb.TYPE, fb.TITLE, fb.CONTENTS, fb.ENDYN, CASE WHEN fb.ENDYN = 'Y' THEN DATE_FORMAT(fb.ENDTIME, '%Y-%m-%d') ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(fb.BEGINTIME, '%Y-%m-%d'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(fb.ENDTIME, '%Y-%m-%d')) END AS eventTime, fi.BIZNAME FROM FOOD114_BOARD fb JOIN FOOD114_BIZ_INFO fi ON fb.USERID = fi.BIZID WHERE fi.BIZID = #{bizId}
SELECT B.*, CONCAT(F.FILEPATH, F.FILENAME) AS PATH FROM FOOD114_BOARD B LEFT JOIN FOOD114_BOARD_FILE F ON B.BOARDNO = F.BOARDNO WHERE B.BOARDNO = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE FOOD114_BOARD_FILE SET FILEPATH = #{path}, FILENAME = #{fileName}, FILEORGNAME = #{orgName}, FILESIZE = #{fileSize}, FILEETC = #{etc} WHERE BOARDNO = #{boardNo}
